sect3.title: StandardContainerService, StandardContainerWidget
sect3.para: Although classified as container, StandardContainerService is really a filter. It acts as intelligent container, by routing an action() to its child service only when the request InputData is such that demands it.

StandardContainerWidget is also much like filter, it contains one child widget—but unlike in FilterWidgets, this child is named. Child contained in StandardContainerWidget is often referred to as root widget, as in standard Aranea configuration it starts the hierarchy of real application widgets.
See for purpose and philosophy behind FlowContext.
